mapper.select: SELECT qna_question_no qnaNo, qna_question_title qnaTitle, account_id accountId, qna_disclosure qnaQuestionDisclosure, qna_state qnaQuestionState, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate FROM qna_question ORDER BY create_date DESC

SELECT qna_question_no qnaQuestionNo, qna_question_title qnaQuestionTitle, qna_question_content qnaQuestionContent, account_id accountId, qna_disclosure qnaQuestionDisclosure, qna_state qnaQuestionState, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate FROM qna_question WHERE qna_question_no = ${qnaNo}

SELECT qna_answer_no qnaAnswerNo, qna_answer_title qnaAnswerTitle, qna_answer_content qnaAnswerContent, account_id accountId, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate FROM qna_answer WHERE qna_answer_no = ${qnaNo}
